snippet: Democrats won control of the State Senate on Monday, a minor prize after failing to recall Gov. Scott Walker last month over his attacks on government unions.
abstract: Democrats win control of Wisconsin's State Senate after a two-week recount in a recall election; victory is mitigated by fact that the party failed to recall Gov Scott Walker over his attacks on government unions.
lead_paragraph: Democrats won control of the State Senate on Monday, a minor prize after failing to recall Gov. Scott Walker last month over his attacks on government unions.
